EmailTemplate.name: 21_Nav_Sensors_CH_LaserefIV-with-Dassault_Webinar_Zoom.202104_CH_Americas_LASERE
EmailTemplate.subject: It's this week - LASEREF IV upgrade webinar with Honeywell and Dassault Aircraft Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join us at the LASEREF IV Upgrade webinar! Designed specifically for Falcon aircraft operators and pilots, this webinar will provide information on the LASEREF IV upgrade options and incentives, plus:
- Affected aircraft with older LASEREF IIs and IIIs - Benefits of the LASEREF IV upgrade - Trade-in credits and ordering information
By attending this webinar, you'll be able to learn everything about this upgrade and how you can improve your aircraft safety and efficiency.
Reserve your seat now!
DATE April 14th, 2021
TIME 2:00 PM EST
LOCATION Online
HOSTED BY Honeywell and DAS REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_DwgaEGRRRT2DOSQZnwYt4g]]>
